EmailTemplate.subject: VisiNet CAM Connection - October Newsletter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
September 2011 Edition
Welcome to our monthly edition of TriTech Software Systems: CAM Connection for VisiNet Solutions. CAM stands for “Client Account Manager” and in an effort to bring you more customized and timely information, we have developed this publication exclusively for the customers of our VisiNet Solutions group. Feel free to let us know if you have suggestions on topics you would like to hear about.
Corporate News
TriTech Acquires VisionAIR TriTech's Vision for 2012 and Beyond
Product Highlights
Webinar: TriTech's Fusion ePCR 6.2 Featuring Interface with VisiCAD Rotation Provider Selected as APCO 2011 HOT Product
Service Update
Customer Service Assurance - Survey Results Service Process Improvements: Engineering Level Support and Customer Support Thursdays Tech Tip: Updating Sectors After a Refresh of Your Non-Production CAD System Grab and Go with Greg (Next Session on Monday, October 10) - Topic: Internet Integration in Streetfinder
TriCON News
TriCON 2011 Recap Planning Now for TriCON 2012
Customer Feature
Rural Metro Orlando and Sumter County (FL) Goes Live
